career_info.summary: This program prepares students for a career in law, with graduates typically finding employment in companies offering an average annual salary between 3.20 LPA and 4.50 LPA.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 3.20 LPA to 4.50 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in law.
